org.eclipse.core.resources
Interface IMarkerUpdate

public interface IMarkerUpdate

IMarkerUpdates define an algorithm for updating a marker's attributes based on a given set of edit information. Any marker type can contribute a custom marker update algorithm describing how attribute updates should occur.

Method Summary
 void updateMarker(org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker marker, int replaceStart, int replaceEnd, int replaceSize)
          Updates the given marker, based on the provided edit information.
 

Method Detail

updateMarker

public void updateMarker(org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker marker,
                         int replaceStart,
                         int replaceEnd,
                         int replaceSize)
                  throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Updates the given marker, based on the provided edit information.
Parameters:
marker - The marker to update.
replaceStart - The character position at the start of the replaced range. This value is zero-relative and inclusive.
replaceEnd - The character position at the end of the replaced range. This value is zero-relative and exclusive.
replaceSize - The size of the new block that replaced the range described by replaceStart and replaceEnd.
Throws:
CoreException - If this method fails. Reasons include:
  • The given range is invalid.
